contest-event.event-date:
Aug. 13, 1932 D Bridgwater Band Festival (Open Championship)
Bridgwater Band Festival (Open Championship) 10 Test Piece Contest Bridgwater Band Festival bridgwater-band-festival-open-championship
Recollections of Wallace
Blake Gardens, Bridgwater, Somerset, England, UK March contest combined with Section 2 - 1st Abercynon, 2nd 5th Batt Welsh Regt, 3rd Glastonbury. Prizes - 1st £20 and shield, 2nd £14, 3rd £10, 4th £5. 10 bands competed.
Dec. 12, 2016, 4:10 p.m. March 10, 2017, 12:26 p.m.
1 Radstock Silver Prize Band Thomas Valentine
2 5th Batt. Welsh Regt. T.A. William Griffiths
3 Windsor Colliery Workmen's Silver M. Jeremiah
4 Bristol and District N.U.R. Noel Thorpe
